name: Robo Rampage (JacobLueke)
description:
This is a first-person wave-based shooter that takes inspiration from games like Call of Duty. You fight against oncoming waves of enemy robots that have a variety of attacks. As you play and get kills you unlock new abilities and weapons.

The more kills you get the better weapons and gear you unlock.

To view more information on this game, and see my other projects go to https://www.lueke.live/
